name: Alien Survivor
description:
After a meteorite collides with your spaceship, you are forced to make an emergency landing in a non-explored planet, only to discover you have to protect yourself and your ship while you wait for help.

At daytime, protect yourself in a tower-defense-like section where you are able to fight alongside your automated turrets and, at night, dive deep into the caves to mine for ores so you can upgrade your defenses.

This is my first game, which is made as a project for my Game Development class, so don't be too harsh ;^)! 

(The game is not on a playable state right now...)
